direction.raw_text: The end of another school year, and for me no doubt another failure... Rico, pay attention ! The teacher JEAN RASCZAK, 38, a rugged veteran who proudly displays his missing hand, scowls at Johnny, bemused.

direction.raw_text: Here in History and Moral Philosophy we've explored the decline of Democracy when social scientists brought the world to the brink of chaos, and how the veterans took control and imposed a stability that has lasted for generations since... direction.raw_text: No. Something given has no value ! Haven't I taught you dimwits anything ? I guess they ought to revoke my teaching credential... Laughter. Johnny's cartoon, meanwhile, is taking shape: Johnny and Carmen flying round planet Venus in a space ship.

direction.raw_text: When you vote, you're exercising political authority. You're using force. And force, my friends, is violence, the supreme authority from which all other authority derives.

direction.raw_text: For our final today, please identify the mouthparts, the abdominal organs, and for extra credit, locate the nerve cord and count the ganglia. You may begin. The students remove the cover to reveal large alien bugs, 60 centimeter ARKELLIAN SAND BEETLES laid out for dissection.

direction.raw_text: Just a bug, eh ? We humans like to think we are Nature's finest achievement. I'm afraid it isn't true. This Arkellian Sand Beetle is superior in many ways. It has fewer moving parts, can reproduce itself in vast numbers, and unboud by concerns of ego and mortality, makes the perfect selfless member of society.

direction.raw_text: Better put your goggles on. Johnny slices the abdomen open with asurgical laser. Green fluid sprays from the slit. Carmen turns away looking ill.

direction.raw_text: Our galaxy is teaming with insect life. We have identified over two billion species so far. Human, life, it would seem, is the anomaly.

direction.raw_text: But we 're intelligent. Human minds have invented art, mathematics and interstellar travel.

direction.raw_text: True, we know of no insect society that has produced a Shakespeare, an Einstein or a Cherynkov, but before you let that go to your head, take the example of the Arachnids, a highly organized, highly evolved insect society. She points to an insect evolution chart that starts with a common ant and ends with a two meter tall ARACHNID WARRIOR.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, don't laugh. Everyone oughta have a friend like me ! Ace makes a big friendly show of trading places with Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Ace, back off the line ! Bacl off the line ! Now everyone's laughing, pushing Ace to the back of the line. Johnny has his grub. Dizzy comes up with her tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, amigo, come chow with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thanks, Diz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your malfunction, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are. I joined up to get out on my own. And you had to tag along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ? You think I joined the Mobile Infantery because of you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You saying you didn't ? Johnny turns away. Dizzy watches him go, hurt. 56        EXT        OBSTACLE COURSE - DAY - THE RECRUITS tumble down the difficult course in their power suits. At the head of the pack , breathing hard, Johnny and Ace race.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes you think... you'll make... squad leader, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something... I've got...you don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You rich kids... are all the same !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It isn't about rich... It's about who's best...! They come to a trap, prepare to leap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coming through ! Dizzy jumps over them from behind. Johnny and Ace tumble into the mud. They watch, chagrined, as Dizzy reaches the end of the course effortlessly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, move it, you apes ! 57
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - DIZZY enters as the recruits scrub down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We all have one thing in common. We were all stupid enough to sign up for Mobile Infanterie. What's your excuse, Breckinridge ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, my family is all farmers. I hate farming. Mobile Infantery's pure picnic by comparison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the grow 'em big and dumb on the farm planet, eh ?        Djana'd ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going in for politics. You gotta be a citizen for that. So here I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, keep it going... Katrina !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanna be a mom. It's easier to get a licence if you've served.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going career... officer's training. That's why I wanna be squad leader. They look for that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wanting it doesn't make you the best one for the job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah ? I don't see anyone else here with the chops to lead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, maybe you better look again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Federation's gonna give me a scholarship when my hitch is up. I wanna be a neurologist, study brain chemisty and associated stimulus... Dizzy dresses down. Johnny and all the other guys check her out. She has a fabulous body. Dizzy cathes Johnny looking. He turns his back as she steps into the shower next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your turn, Rico !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, who asked you to be so nosey ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me, I got plans to be writer, and a writer's got a right to be nosey. Flores, you know Rico from Buenos Aires... What's his story ? Dizzy uses her hand to divert the shower spray towards Johnny's crotch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, some say he turned his back on the family fortune to be a citizen, others say he did it for a girl... missed a spot there, bucko... which is funny because Johnny says I joined up to be with him, but why would I do that ? He doesn't even like me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't look that way to me. Everyone look down at Johnny's crotch, laughing. Johnny blushes, grabs a towel and exits the shower. 58        INT BARRACKS - NIGHT - INTO CAMERA - JOHNNY pans the barracks with a little handcam, neat bunks in a row, other recruits lounging around in their skivvies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it's not much, but it's home. Over there's my bunk where I dream about you every night... Ace, Kitten Smith, Shujumi and Breckinridge dance around and moon the camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, do you mind ? Johnny moves the camera away from the guys. Katrina walks by from the shower with Dizzy, mugs into frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what's going on ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet it's that girl I was talking about... Her name's Carmen, I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carmen ! Ooh la la, Carmencita !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Carmen ! Johnny heads for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, where you going ? Come back...! He's getting awy... Grab him...! The picture goes all screwy, comes up again on: 59
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - INTO CAMERA - JOHNNY talk quietly now outside the barracks door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boot's pretty tough, and sometimes I think I won't make it, but then I imagine you're watching me, and that gives me someting... I try harder. Thanks to you, I think I might have a shot at squad leader. The barracks lights go out. Taps plays over the public address. Johnny lowers his voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh, I gotta pack it in. I hope you're having fun, hope you're careful. No training accidents for you, eh ? (leaning into camera) I want to kiss you so badly. I want to feel you next to me, I- Behind him , someone begins to sing , badly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you truly, so truly, dear...! Ace, the singer, and the other guys peer down from the transom over the door, giggling, delighted with themselves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - CARMEN watches the end of Johnny's letter. Ace continues to sing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our love will grow, dear, year by year...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye ! Write me ! I'm gonna kill you guys ! The letter ends. Carmen smiles. A BALD CADET PILOT smacks her on the arm as she runs by in a sleek blue pressure suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orbit in five, Ibanez ! First one there gets to fly ! Grinning, Carmen grabs her duffel, takes off after her. 61
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - CARMEN and the bald cadet race for the hatch past other recruits. 62
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY CYCLE-CARMEN gets there first, jumps into the pilot seat. The Bald Pilot takes second seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking it down ! Two LATE CADETS duck in through the closing hatch door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no, not Ibanez again, she's crazy !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On my mark, in three, two, one... 63
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - THE BOAT straeks upward from the lunar floor past orbitting training platforms where
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in brightly colored pressure suits float against the Earth which hangs beyond the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LUNAR ORBIT - CARMEN blasts past a DESTROYER orbiting in dock, zips between CORVETTES and other slower fleet traffic in the crowded space lanes of Luna. The two late cadets are terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Geez, I thought I liked to fly fast !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is nothing. Today, I get to fly that ! She points. Now visible from behind a host of smaller ships,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of older design, but impressive. 65
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMAND AND CONTROL - DAY CYCLE - CARMEN arrives on the bridge, dark, cramped, all-business. She salutes the instructor,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pilot Trainee Ibanez reporting for duty, ma'am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take the number one chair, Ibanez. Follow all instructions of you supervisor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, ma'am ! Carmen turns for her station, but stops in her tracks. Her supervisor is Zander Barcalow, now a 2nd Lieutenant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey ! What are you doing here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the guy who's gonna teach you to fly this crate. Carmen logs on. The ship recognizes her as a pilot trainee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Assistant insructor... You must be some kind of a hot stick. Should I call you "sir" ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only when I give you an order.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prepare for departure. Carmen and Zander go to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's amazing, us running into each other like this. Maybe it's fate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe not. I heard about this crazy girl coming through the academy, solid math, a little wild on the stick, but a natural. When it turned out it was you, I made sure we'd run into each other...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, take her out, Ibanez.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, ma'am. All eyes are on carmen as she grabs the stick. The ship shudders under her hand. She winks at Zander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In simulation, my supervisors could never keep up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't simulation anymore. Take'er out easy, cadet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes, sir. Vector ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twenty-five by five, roll seven. And don't exceed port speed. Carmen rocks the stick, and the view from the bridge spins smoothly away from the dense orbiting yards os Luna toward the outer system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They revoke our flight status.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I see... teamwork. Carmen jogs past lumbering freighters. Zander's impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steady as she goes, number one. Prepare for warp. Number two, design for Jupiter orbit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, ma'am. Star drive in three... two... one... Space appears to bend. Zander and Carmen share a smile. They blur together, becoming one, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STARSHIP ATHENA disappears in a flash of blinding light. 67        EXT        WAR GAMES COURSE - DAY - THE RECRUITS have been divided into two teams. RED TEAM includes Ace, Katrina, Breckinridge, and Djana'd. Johnny, Shujumi, Kitten Smith, and Dizzy are part of BLUE TEAM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The object of this exercise is to capture your enemy's flag before your enemy captures yours. Bronski passes out Morita SmartRifles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These weapons have been modified for this exercise. If your enemy hits you, your suit will fail. You will be unable to move. You will be as good as dead. 68        EXT        WAR GAMES COURSE - LATER - DJANA'D bumps the magnification of her heads up display to survey Blue Team's flag guarded by two recruits. She jumps down to joining other Red Team members on the move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's right over the next ridge... Only two guards. Johnny, Kitten Smith, and Dizzy open fire from athicket as they pass. Djana'd and the others collapse as their suits fail, Djana'd laughing because playing at war seems funny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are now prisoners of the Blue Team. Tell us your plans or die !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no ! Name, rank, and mind your own business is all you get from me ! 69
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - RED TEAM opens fire as the Blue Team appears. Shujumi and other Blue Team members go down in an ambush led by Breckinridge. Johnny dives for cover, and finds himself sharing it with Dizzy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going in ! Let's go ! Kitten Smith makes arun for the flag with a rifle team. Ace and Katrina open fire from two new hidden Red Team positions, taking Kitten and his team down with a cross fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, they're defended... no way in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flip six, three hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High school... remember ? Run a flip six, three hole play, and you might score... Johnny looks at the course in a new way, nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cover me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it. Johnny tumbles open ground, vaults into the air. Dizzy takes out Breckinridge as he rises to fire. Johnny lands, knocks out Katrina, then Ace. He picks up Ace's fallen Morita.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, pal. 70
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - ZIM AND CORPORAL BRONSKI watch Johnny firing both Moritas simultanously and taking out the remaining Red Team defenders. He grabs the Red Team flag and hurls it into the air like spear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kid's got some moves... 71
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE RECRUITS line up in the door of a SKIMMER, the military's standard utility aircraft, to practice drops from altitude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smith, GO ! McIntire, GO ! Flores, GO ! Rico, I'm making you sqaud leader !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, thank you, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't stand there dumb... GO ! Johnny jumps, plummeting toward the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: YEEEE-Haaaaaaaaaaaaa...! Next in line, Ace scowls. 72
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - THE RECRUITS have some free time. Johnny makes a big show of polishing the chevrons that designate him as Squad Leader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at him. Do you think anyone has ever been so pleased with himself ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zim hadda choose someone to be his brown nose, I guess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just want you guys to know that I'll never do anything that I haven't asked you to do first. Johnny approaches Dizzy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Couldn't've done it without you, Diz. Friends ? Dizzy smiles, shakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure... friends. Bronski walks through with the mail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Levy... Shujumi... Rico. Johnny grabs the E-disk, pops it into his handcam. The Fleet Mail logo appears:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bet it's from my girl. Johnny's pals gather for a look. Carmen appears, dressed down to skivvies, in her quarters aboard starship Athena.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Johnny, I would've written sooner, but they've really got us going every moment here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeow, Rico, you don't deserve that !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhhh...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you're doing so well. If they haven't made you squad leader by now, I'm sure you will. Johnny holds up his squad leader chevrons victoriously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All it takes is the love of a good woman... The image changes abrupltly. Now Carmen's wearing a trim blue flight suit. She stands the camera on Athena's gunnery deck. Outside , the rings of Saturn sparkle in bright solar light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at that. Isn't it beautiful ? I had to show you. It's great to be out here on my own. I'm just not some little girl from Buenos Aires anymore. I'm gonna be a starship pilot, and I'm gonna see the universe... (she sighs) And that's also the problem because I don't really want to get married, Johnny. I don't want to have kids. I want a command, a ship of my own, and you know, I don't think that's gonna leave a lot of room for you and me. Johnny is stunned. All the other recruits suddenly seem to have something else to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know that's not what you wanted to hear... but I have to follow my heart. I'm sorry. I'm afraid you'll hate me, and I couldn't stand that. Write me, alright ? Write me, so I'll know that we'll always be friends. The Fleet Mail logo appears again:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Johnny shuts the handcam off. Ace puts a hand on his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny how they always want to be your friends after they kick your guts out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's what I deserve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whad'ya talkin  about ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I joined up for her. I wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for her. I'm a fool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You made squad leader on your own, and, hey, you still got me to kick around. Johnny smiles in spite of himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, Ace. Johnny turns for the door, flipping the chevrons like a coin. Dizzy watches him leave. She'd so like to comfort him. 73        EXT        LIVE FIRE COMBAT RANGE - DAY - THE RECRUITS arm their Marauder power suits. Zim and Bronski wear Command model suits with rank designations. Johnny checks weapons, scans the electronics on each squad member's power suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the Marauder's visual capabilities, all you have to do is look at something to hit it, so you will exercise EXTREME CARE on my firing line. Do you get me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, yes, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The live firing combat range is the closest simulation of actual combat we can provide. If you do not hit your target, it will shoot you... Fifty blackened AUTOMATED TARGET DRONES fitted with pulse guns are presently visible along a gauntlet of low walls, gullies, and three-story building facades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Marauder power suit will prevent serious injury, but if you are hit, you will be non-operational and your team score will suffer accordingly. Rico, has each member of your squad completed a weapons safety check ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, yes, sir ! On a signal from Zim, the Live Fire Combat Range comes to life as the target drones take cover and disappear from view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect score for this exercise is 300. B company came through last week with 285. I expect you to do better. 74
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE RECRUITS take out the target drones as they appear. Halfway through the course, a recruit takes a hit and goes down, immobilized. Djana'd has a clear shot, but Breckinridge gets in her way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're in my line of fire, Breckinridge Before the others can react, a second drone appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! EVERYBODY DOWN ! Everyone kisses dirt. Pulses from the two drones fly thick overhead. Shujumi rises to fire, a round slams him back to the ground. Johnny and Djana'd knock out the two drones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, no more screw ups. Ace takes point. Diz, you and Kitten Smith cover the flanks. Djana'd, you're rear guard. Move out. The squad resumes ist advance. Breckinridge bangs on his helmet. There is something wrong with his "head up" display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the problem ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dunno. Display's fritzed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lose another rifle, we're gonna mess up our score...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me see. Breckinridge takes off helmet, hands it to Johnny. Djana'd turns on Breckinridge. Her "head up" zeroes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come when something goes wrong, it's always you, Breckinridge ? That's when Djana'd trips on a loose stone. She fumbles her rifle and it discharges. The round tears the top of Breckinridge's head off. The recruits stare in horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God... uh... MEDIC ! Zim arrives with Bronski on the bounce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rico, you are relieved of squad command. Levy, McIntire you will escort private Rico to the C.O.'s Office. The recruits watch Johnny leave, stare aghast at their dead comrade. No one looks at Djana'd, who stands alone sobbing. 75
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .O.'S OFFICE - DAY - JOHNNY stands before the C.O. braced by Katrina and Ace. Zim and the C.O.  are both saddened by the proceedings. C.O. Rico, did you give the recruit permission to remove his helmet ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, yes, sir. Breckinridge reported a helmet malfunction, and I asked him to show it to me, sir. C.O. Are you rated to repair a Marauder power suit, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, no, sir. C.O. Then why did you order your man to remove his helmet during a live fire exercise ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, I needed everyone in my squad operational, sir... I... I wanted to win, sir. C.O: (sigh) You disobeyed safety regulation 21-404. You may, of course, demand trial by court martial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, no, sir ! C.O. Do you freely admit to the charges made against you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir... I guess I do, sir. Zim looks out the window. Djana'd, dressed for travel, in civilian clothes, crying as she heads off down Washout Lane. C.O. Sergeant, we've lost two recruits over this incident already... is there any possibility of salvaging this man ? Zim I believe so, sir. C.O. Alright. We'll try administrative punishment. Until then you are confined to your quarters, Rico. 76
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SUNSET - JOHNNY looks out the window to the parade ground where a POST has been erected. The recruits look up as Zim enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, let's go, Rico. Johnny takes off his shirt. Ace who now holds the chevrons of squad leader, watches, feels bad for his pal. 77
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SUNSET - THE RECRUITS stand with recruits from other platoons. Johnny is led to the post and strung up as the C.O. reads the charge. C.O. For incompetence of command, for failure to abide by safety regulations in a live fire exercise, for negligence which contributed to the death of a teammate... Zim steps up to Johnny, offers him a red rubber mouthpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bite on this. It helps. I know. C.O. ... recruit trainee John Rico is sentenced to administrative punishment. Ten lashes. Johnny takes it in his mouth. His tear away shirt is torn away. Johnny stands at the post alone. Corporal Bronski, a big man with an unhappy task, unrolls his whip. C.O. You may carry out the sentence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Johnny's face wrenched by pain, spontanous tears, a terrible sound stifled by the bright red mouthpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Again. Dizzy flinches for Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Ace looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Zim watches without any apparent emotion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Johnny faints, sagging against his tether.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STARSHIP ATHENA cruises past, 600,000 metric tons of star class destroyer, FIGHTERS and LANDING BOATS lining her open hangar deck. 79
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMAND AND CONTROL - NIGHT CYCLE - CARMEN works alone on the empty bridge. She yawns. Zander brings coffee for himself and Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. You read my mind. Third watch always seems to last forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't know... Depends on who you are spending it with. He caresses her hair. She kisses his hand. Zander notices the plot map.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Profile's wrong... there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I replotted the course. It's more efficient this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three weeks aboard a starship and you know it all, huh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, check it. Zander slides into his chair, runs a check.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I was talking to Captain, Deladier, and she said...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't change the subject. Am I right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, whad'ya know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't mess with the boss. So what'd the captain say ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She got a command... and she thinks we oughta team up officially and crew for her. She thinks we're good together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You and me, huh ? Zander turns his chair so they are very close, moves a finger along her hand, up her arm and playfully around her breasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a feeling about us. We're good together, way ahead of the curve in every department. I seem to be able to anticipate your needs. You know what I want... Carmen grabs him between his legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, what do you want ? Zander pulls her to him and they kiss passionately. She brteaks it off, gets serious for amoment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to be part of the best flight team in the Fleet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me, too... Day and Night-Cycle. They start to caress again when suddenly ALARMS sound. Captain Deladier appears on the hot screen, still waking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain, we are in the path of an unidentified object moving at near light speed... Carmen and Zander frantically check their displays.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... IT'S BIG !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It looks like an... asteroid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In this part of the system ? Carmen and Zander see it through the front screens:                A huge
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: tumbles directly towards them at terrific speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet Jesus...! Carmen breaks glass that reads EMERGENCY RETROS, arms the switch within and fires the rockets. 80
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STARSHIP ATHENA torques to one side. The asteroid grazes the ship, cutting ahuge gash in Athena's hull. Ice and rock travelling in ist wake shreds
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - CARMEN AND Zander brace themseves as diamond hard particles pound the front screens. The ship continues to tumble. 82
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - FLIGHT DECK - A FIGHTER loses it's mooring, tumbling into other craft, explosions ripping the deck. 83
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - CREWMEN are sucked into space. Others hang on frantically as automatic doors seal Athena's wound and their fates. 84
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - CAPTAIN Deladier arrives on the bridge, now crowded as other FLIGHT OFFICERS rush to their stations. Zander's going through star charts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where'd it come from ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trajectory indicates it came out of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Number 4, contact Fleet and tell 'em there's a loose asteroid headed their way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Communications are down, ma'am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Engineering. Damage assessment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hull's compromised. We're lucky to be alive, ma'am. Deladier notices Carmen staring at a monitor, stunned. A DEAD CAP TROOPER trails in the wreckage of the flight deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good work, Number 1. You'll do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, ma'am. 85
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY wears his civilian clothes, pcks as the other recruits get ready for the day's training. No one says anything. He moves stiffly, careful of his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It stinks, you goin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't stay where I'm not wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If they didn't want you, they woulda kicked you out, amigo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, they humiliated me in front of everyone ! I'm just supposed to take it, huh ? Well, I'm not gonna, and I guess that proves I just can't cut it. Corporal Bronski leans in, impassive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your call's going through, Rico. Take it there. A nearby VU-PHONE lights up. The screen flashes:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His mother appears when she picks up the other end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello... Oh, Johnny...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, mom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bill... pick up... it's Johnny ! You little rat. You haven't called, you haven't written. It's been so lonely here without you... The screen splits as Johnny's father activates an extension.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny ! Where's your uniform...? Johnny's mother makes a face to shut him up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's just good to hear from you. What's up, son ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not really working out for me here, dad. I was thinking... I was hoping it would be alright if I came home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, of course you should come home immedietly !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've made a mess of things. I've been so stupid...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't talk like that. Get yourself home as fast as you can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll all have dinner. I'll fix your favorite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah ! We'll talk it out and have a good glass of wine ... and... well, we love you, son. The sky in Buenos Aires seems to darken perceptively. Johnny's mother looks out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my, what's that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like rain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This time of the year...? The transmission ends abruptly. A phone company logo appears:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your transmission has been terminated due to atmospheric interference. Please try your call again later. Johnny zips his duffel, hefts it gingerly over his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, see ya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You take the stroll down Washout Lane, you're only proving one thing, Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that, Diz ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That you don't have what it takes to be acitizen ! Dizzy turns on her heel and marches away. 86
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .O.'S OFFICE - DAY - JOHNNY signs form 1240/A. Zim stands as witness. C.O. Now you, Sergeant. Zim signs bitterly. The C.O. sighs. C.O. That's it, son. You can go. The C.O. and Zim turn to other things. Johnny picks up his duffel and heads out the door. 87
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY walks alone, sad. A skimmer hums by overhead and he looks after it. Out across the parade ground he sees the glint of Marauder power suits as recruits tumble the obstacle course. 88        EXT        WASHOUT LANE -- DAY - JOHNNY reaches the little white fence that leads to the transporter. He turns back for one last look and notices people running to the Comminications shack. Kitten Smith runs by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Kitten, what's going on ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's war ! 89
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY joins others to see what's on the Federal Net. Recruits, non-coms, and officers gather        without any sense of military decorum. People cry openly, among them Corporal Bronski.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... early estimates. Millions dead, a city in ruins... On screen, the smoldering ruins of what was once a huge city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, jeez, is that Geneva ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goddam bugs whacked us, Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Buenos Aires has been wiped of the Earth. Nothing lives in what was once called the Latin Paradise... Johnny is horrified. Dizzy is suddenly standing next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, Johnny, geez... It's home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Federal Court met moments ago and voted unanimously for mobilization to destroy the Arachnid threat. Johnny sets his jaw, turns and runs for the C.O.'s office. 90
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .O.'S OFFICE -DAY - THE C.O: AND ZIM and other staffers watch the grim news unfold. Animation illustrates the insect treachery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The meteor derived from here, near Klendathu, in the Arachnid's home system...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm serious, sir. I'll go anywhere. I want combat. C.O. Forget it, Zim. We're gonna need you here. The only way you'll get a combat assignment is if you bust yourself to private. You get me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir, I get you. C.O. What can I do for you, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, I wish to reconsider my request to drop out, sir. C.O. Sorry, son. I can't do it. You signed the 1240/A. It would be illegal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, i know it was wrong. I didn't learn from one mistake and I made another, sir. (then) Sir, my family... my whole family was in Buenos Aires, sir. Zim picks up Johnny's 1240/A off the C.O.'s desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that your signature, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, yes it is, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't look like it to me. Zim gives the C.O. a look. The C.O. shrugs, turns away, watching the news of the coming war. Zim tears up the 1240/A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get outa here, private. 91
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - HUMANKIND GOES TO WAR ! Actual pictures of Buenos Aires:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pick through rubble, people wail, kids play tag in the ruins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out of the ashes of Buenos Aires comes first sorrow, then ANGER !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only good bug is a dead bug !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like to know more ? 92
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - VICTORY ON DANTANA ! A wounded CAP TROOPER, grim smile, flashes "V" for victory as his weary comrades carry him off the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cap Troopers establish a foothold on Dantana, a planet system at the outer edge of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone. Casualties are high, but casualties won't stop the Mobile Infantery ! Would you like to know more ? 93
direction.name: direction

result.heading: KIDS KILL BUGS AND MOM IS GLAD

direction.raw_text: - KIDS KILL BUGS AND MOM IS GLAD !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: smiles as her CUTE KIDS stomp insects in the garden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turn out ordnance. PEOPLE line up to enlist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone's doing their share. Are you ? The war effort needs your effort at work, at home, in your community. Would you like to know more ? 94
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SKY MARSHALL ANNOUNCES OFFENSIVE !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: addresses the FEDERAL COUNCIL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are a generation commanded by fate to defend humankind ! We must meet the threat with our valor, our blood, with our very lives, to insure that human civilization, not insect, dominates this galaxy now and always. The council rises to its feet for a standing ovation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sky Marshall Dienes announces plans for an offensive against Klendathu, source of the bug meteor that destroyed Buenos Aires. 95
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - AQZ - FLEET BATTLE STATION TICONDEROGA is a sprawling pre-fab structure covering several square kilometers of space where STARSHIPS are stacked in berths. Super title:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We now break net and take you live to Fleet Battle Station Ticonderoga deep inside the Arachnid Quarantine Zone. 96
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - THE CAMERA follows the Net Correspondentas he works a corridor crowded with MOBILE INFANTERY and FLEET PERSONNEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one here in the AQZ knows when the invasion of Kendathu will occur, but everyone's talking about it, and the talk says tomorrow ! Newly minted cap troopres Johnny, Dizzy, Ace, and Kitten Smith happen along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's a bunch of M.I. kids who look like they eat bugs for lunch !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yum, yum yum ...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're not to worried about fighting the Arachnids...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, shoot a nuke down a bug hole, lotta dead bugs, am I right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just hope it's not over before we get in it !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some say the bugs were provoked by human attempts to colonize within the AQZ, that a "live and let live" policy is preferable to war with the bugs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, I'm from Buenos Aires, and I say kill'em all ! 97
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - JOHNNY and his friends drink at a crowded bar. Around the room there's singing and dancing, a mad sort of revelry bred of fear and excitement, but nearby a VETERAN drinks alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That guy's been in it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you tell ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The eyes. He's got the 1000 meters stare. He's hard and humorless, all wised up. Ace admires his LASER CUT TATTOOS. Dizzy eyes his skull and crossbone earring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great scars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like the jewelry. Hey, amigo, where can I get an earring like yours ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Port Joe Smith, Outer Rings, Dantana... Every time I come back from a drop, my gunny gives me a bone. I got three now. You don't see a lot of guys with three.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Waht's it like... combat ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess it's not so bad. I mean as long as you don't get any on you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get any what on you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you'll know when it happens. See you on the bounce. The veteran pays his tab and heads out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say we all go to the laser parlor and get cut together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I want with a scar ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What, your skin's too pretty ? C'mon, everyone's doing it !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey        Johnny !        Johnny Rico ! Johnny looks up and sees Carmen. She lloks graet in uniform with the hat and the lieutenant's bars on her shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carmen... ? Johnny remembers himself, snaps to attention, salutes. Dizzy and the others follow suit. Carmen salutes back, sheepish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh... at ease. Guess I oughta lose the hat when I'm off duty, eh ? Dizzy, disgusted, turns back to Ace and Kitten Smith. Carmen tucks her hat under her arm. Her hair is very short.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to your hair ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think ? Everyone did it when we got our wings. You don't like it, do you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright, I guess. You hear from anyone made it out of B.A. alive ? Carmen shakes her head, sadly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's funny. Sometimes I forget. Then it hits me, and I can't stop crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I try just to be happy I'm still alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't look very happy to see me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should I be ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny... Life is so different from the way it was. One day you'll see what I did was best for both of us. Zander leaves a group of FLEET OFFICERS to join them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything coposetic, Lieutenant ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zander, you remember Johnny ? Zander and I are a flight team now. Zander puts his arm around Carmen, gives her a squeeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Best in the Fleet !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I get it. This is the part that's best for both of us. Don't do me anymore favors, eh ? Johnny turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny, wait...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it, Carmen. The Mobile Infantery does a thankless, dirty job, so they naturally tend to be short-tempered, thoughtless and rude. Johnny turns back to face Zander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got something to say about the Mobile Infantery ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You heard me. Wanna make something out of it, private ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not with an officer, no, sir. The M.I. doesn't mint stupid cap troopers. Everyone can see what's about to happen. A circle is forming, Fleet on one side, Mobile Infantery on the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's disregaed rank... Everybody hear that ? Rank is not an issue here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zander, please... Let's go ! Zander takes off his hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright. What's he gonna do ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Johnny punches him right in the nose. Zander goes down, bleeding. Ace and Kitten Smith grab Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, easy there, buddy... Nice punch. Zander staggers to his feet, ready to fight, but Fleet Officers pull him back. Carmen looks at Johnny, the hate in his eye, the blood on his fist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong with you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, it's just a vestigal response to procreation... bitch. Carmen turns away, stung. Johnny immediately regrets. Dizzy, for her part, couldn't be happier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it, Johnny. Cap Troopers and Fleet weren't meant to mix ! 98
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT CYCLE - JOHNNY grinds his teeth as a laser mounted on a robot arm finishes slicing an intricate pattern into his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It hurts...! Dizzy, Ace, and Kitten Smith awtch, grinning, passing a bottle. Ace pours booze directly into the fresh wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, this hurts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, here's to it ! We're gonna fightn, and we're gonna win ! They put their arms side by side. Each has a similiar scar: Lightning bolts on a shield and the words:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mobile Infantery rules !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Death to all bugs !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't get any on you ! 99
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - FROM SPACE - FLEET STARSHIPS of every class maneuver in tight orbit around the orange planet. The "Mobile Infantery Anthem" plays loke Holst, pounding and relentless. The invasion has begun ! 100
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DROP ROOM - JOHNNY and his platoon, wearing fully armed MARAUDER POWER SUITS, wait to drop with other cap troopers. Their mood is grim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: easy-going and confident, enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer on deck ! Everyone snaps to attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At ease. Alright... we got hot poop straight from the top: Willy's Wildcats is in with the first wave. Means more bugs for us to kill... This does nothing to break the tension. Lt. Willy reassures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now if you follow orders and remember your training, I guarantee you'll make it back alive. Any questions ? There are none.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright... next we got a little last minute briefing from Military Intelli-gence I think you're gonna like... The briefingplays on "head up" displays and the ready room screens. A captive BUG WARRIOR clicks and shrieks as FEDERAL SCIENTISTS torture it. The troopers cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyday Federal scientists are looking for new ways to kill bugs and you can help... The head scientists turns and speaks to camera. It's Carl. Johnny and Dizzy share an amazed grin, noticing a difference in their old friend, something that speaks of... authority.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To defeat the enemy, we must know the enemy. Take for instance your basic Arachnid warrior. Minimal IQ, armored, completely lethal. You can blow a limb off... Carl picks up apulse gun and blows one of the bugs legs off. The insect screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and it's still 86% combat effec-tive. But here's a tip: Aim for the nerve stem and put it down for good. Carl fires again. The bug kicks and squeals as it dies. Carl tosses the pulse gun aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now while you are out killing bugs, we want you to be our eyes and ears. The bugs use some kind of plasma burst to divert meteors and aim them toward Earth. We need to know how they do this. If you encounter any plasma, report it immediately to your superior. Good luck and good hunting ! The briefing ends as klaxons sound. P.A. (O.S.) This is the Captain speaking. All personnel prepare for drop.We are at D minus three and counting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move out ! Johnny and the other troopers climb into capsules on the port track. Dizzy gives him "thumbs up". The capsule seals as it moves with the others down the firing tube. 101
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - JOHNNY gets the shakes as the capsule bumps and booms toward the firing tube. Lt. Willy appears on the "head up" display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smash the entire area, kill anything that has more'n a couple legs , and don't any of you loafers come back aboard with unexpended bombs. Get me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five seconds... Sweat rolls down his face, hyperventilation... WHAM ! 102
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KLENDATHU ORBIT - SILVER CAPSULES stream toward Klendathu from the rear tubes starships of Bull Run. We move down the line past Mannerheim, Dauntless, George Marshall, and Yamamoto to the Rodger Young. 103
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMAND AND CONTROL - CARMEN holds Rodger Young in tight maneuver. Suddenly, a burst of BLUE BUG PLASMA rips past the starboard bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plasma, ma'am... from the planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bug Batteries... According to Military Intelligence, it'll be random and light. Drop status ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop is 35% complete, ma'am. Two more bursts of bug plasma streak past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steady as she goes, Number 1. 104
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - HIGH ATMOSPERE - NIGHT - THE CAPSULES burn when they hit atmosphere, outer skin tearing away in big silver sheets. 105
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - JOHNNY takes in ENTRY DATA from the heads up display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...surface in twenty-fivr seconds ...LZ has been identified ...beacon is in place... 106
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMAND AND CONTROL - CARMEN watches nervously as deadly bursts of bug plasma fill the heavens around the battle group. Below, the surface of Klendathu fairly bistles with outgoing defensive fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't random or light. Someone made amistake...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it, we're empty ma'am ! Out the front screens, a blast from below hits George Marshall amidships and it reels into Yamamoto. Both starships begin to burn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone made a big goddam mistake ! Get us out of here, Number 1 ! Carmen dodges past burning ships, avoids collision with Dauntless, and then KA-WHAM !        they're hit. Carmen flies out of her station and into CAMERA hard. 107
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CLOUD LAYER - NIGHT - THE SECOND SKIN tears away. Johnny is sitting on air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...surface in fifteen seconds... deploying chute now... The chute pops. Across the sky, lit by outgoing bug plasma, he can see hundreds of cap troopers in ordered rows drifting down into the cloud layer. It's quiet in the clouds, then: 108
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - FROM THE AIR - JOHNNY looks down as he passes out of the clouds and sees the battlefield. Plasma blasts exploode into the sky. THOUSANDS OF BUGS boil out of the ground to defend against the invader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...surface in five... four ... three... Johnny burns his chute off, drops the last hundred feet and lands on the bounce. 109
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - JOHNNY'S POV - THE FLASH PULSE of bug batteries, screaming voices on the com, concussions shaking the ground. None of it compares to the sound of his own racing HEARTBEAT. Lieutenant Willy shouts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up there on the ridge ! We'll nuke those bug positions from theAAAAAAAA !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (an airborne Arachnid warrior with powerful rear legs and "pop out" wings for gliding) lands on Lieutenant Willy and cracks his head like a nut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Johnny and Ace open fire, backing away. Pulse rounds tear it apart, bug guts gushing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant's bought the farm. Where's the Sarge...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't see him ! Now comes a flood of WORKERS building ever advancing fortifications, and with them, hundreds of deadly ARACHNID WARRIORS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here they come...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace, what're we doing ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I uh... uh... Dizzy and the others open fire simultanously. The whole area goes white hot in the magnesium flash of so many pulse cannons. Shujumi fires wildly at advancing insects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want some ? Here's some !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't waste your ammon on the workers ! Shujumi can't hear. A warrior finds him, rips his leg off, hurls him back into the waiting jaws of the oncoming bugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He fights, screaming. A claw reaches for his face, ripping the top of his head off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get out of here ! Now the ground opens behind her and a huge (6 meters) TANKER BUG lumbers out of the ground, it's funnel-shaped snout extruding above multiple eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out ! The tanker bug sprays and hits Katrina. She screams, as her legs melt out from under her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Warriors converge to feed on her. Ace wants to help her, but Johnny blocks him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Katrina was right. We gotta get out of here ! 110
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - JOHNNY and the other survivors on the bounce. The entire surface of Klendathu seems to be churning with insects as more and more bugs come to the surface to repel the invasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a general retreat ! The boats are coming down. They come to the rear lines where the Net Correspondent and his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are doing live coverage of the invasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've just landed here on what cap troopers are calling the "Big K" with the 6th Mobile Infantery Division. It's an ugly planet, a bug planet, a planet hostile to life as we kow iGKKKKK ! The Correspondent is cut in half by a warrior. Johnny blows it away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, let's go ! ON THE BOUNCE ! The cap troopers move out. Kitten Smith looks up as a purple beacon streaks acroos thr sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can see the beacon...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Retrieval ! A hopper pounces on Kitten Smithm, and he goes down screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Johnny touches down, stares in horror as Kitten Smith's head rolls past his fee. Johnny opens up with his pulse cannon. The hopper attacks, puts a claw right through Johnny's thigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Crushing jaws close around him, crushing, cutting his flesh. Johnny brings the muzzle of the pulse gun under the hopper's nerve stem and SPLAT !        blows its head apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !        Johnny...! But Dizzy can't find Johnny, and soon she's lost in the smoke. Johnny looks down at the terrible hole in his leg where bright arterial blood gushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medic... MEDIC...! Now two more Arachnid warriors close in on him through the enveloping smoke. He fires his pulse rifle empty, and dropping it, crawls desperately, dragging his useless leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God... Oh, God, help me... please help me...! A third Arachnid warrior rears up in front of him, deadly jaws slashing down toward him, when suddenly it is blown to pieces in the blinding blast of a point-blank pulse cannon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take my hand ! Johnny reaches out. A STEEL HAND takes his, dragging him back as bugs attack. His rescuers's pulse cannon thunders overhead. Bug parts fly as insects swarm in for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Actual pictures of the battlefield, man and insect lying dead together on the blood drenched plains of Klendathu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crsisis for Humankind ! Fleet official admit they underestimated the Arachnid's defensive capability. Would you like to know more ? 112
direction.name: direction

result.heading: FADE OUT 111 FROM THE FEDERAL NET

direction.raw_text: ! Retiring Sky Marshall Dienes salutes incoming SKY MARSHALL TEHAT MERU, 75, bfore a gathering of the Federal Council.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Accepting responsibility for Klendathu, Sky Marshall Dienes resigns. His successor, Sky Marshall Tahat Meru, outlines her new strategy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Until we understand the bug better, we must proceed with caution... We can ill afford another Klendathu. 113
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: display an organizational chart of the Arachnid species topped by a QUESTION MARK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To explain the intelligent military actions of the Arachnids, Federal Scientists postulate the existence of a leadership caste...BRAIN BUGS ! 114
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Names scroll by designated KIA, WIA, and MIA accordingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Families oof those who have died or become incapacitated by Federal Service are entitled to benefits ! If you see the name of a loved one, please do not call. A Federation official will call you. Would you like to know more ? 115
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SOMETIMES LOVED ONES DIE FOR A GOOD REASON

direction.raw_text: - THE RODGER YOUNG limps to port, a huge chunk ripped out of its mid-section. Although stable, she flies inverted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ticonderoga, this is Rodger Young requesting approach vector...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Affirmative, Rodger Young...one zero zero niner five two... welcome back. 116
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMAND AND CONTROL - ZANDER AND CARMEN stare at the BATTLE-SCARED STARSHIPS and BURNT-OUT HULKS that line the docks of Ticonderoga.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, we're lucky to be alive. A bloody bandage wraps Carmen's head. Zander nods grimly. 117
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - GANGWAY - THE DEAD BODIES of CREWMEN and CAP TROOPERS are being off-loaded via conveyer belt. Zander and Carmen make their way up the steep companionway beside the ghastly conveyer belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me hand, willya ? Carmen takes his hand. Zander kisses her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking. Maybe we should get married, Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You weren't thinking...you were dreaming !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we're gonna be a team, why not be a real team ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a war on. I want a command, I want my own ship, you do, too...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who's got time to get married ? Carmen lets his hand go and leaps through the hatch. Zander falls back onto the conveyer belt, finds himself eyeball-to-eyeball with a horribly maimed trooper, scrambles to get off. 118
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - COMMON AREA - ZANDER joins Carmen in the crowded common area where dead bodies compete for space with wounded awaiting triage. Survivors watch casualty lists scroll ba on a Federal Net terminal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fleet encourages marriages among flight officers. You'd probably get a promotion out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not kidding. Marriage is -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, funny there's almost no wounded at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, bugs don't take prisoners. Carmen looks at the words at the Net terminal: WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW MORE ? She bites her lip, enters Johnny's name. In an instant, she has the news:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW MORE

direction.raw_text: . - KIA CARMEN Oh no. Tears fill her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carmen...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me...! She rushes away. Zander looks at Johnny's name on the screen, shrugs, presses the ERASE button. 119
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CORRIDOR - ZANDER finds Carmen, sagging against a wall, weepimg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, I... Everybody's lost someone by now. This shouldn't be any different... Zander puts an arm around her. She holds on tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I... Oh, Zander, I'm a fool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're upset, that's alright. Zander kisses her hair. Tears roll down her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, don't you see ? No one can wait for anything anymore... You're right... We should get married... Zander holds Carmen as she sobs, feeling lucky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY CYCLE - JOHNNY'S BODY floats, suspended in fluid, mouth hanging open, his skin white as death. A low underwater KNOCKING wakes him. He opens his eyes and sees Ace and Dizzy outside the tank. Ace holds up a KIA list, pointing at Johnny's name, laughing: Rico, John V - KIA. Their voices are distant and garbled. Dizzy cups her hands against the side of the tank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two more days. Johnny's wounds are now mostly scars except for his leg where delicate robotic arms culture layers of new tissue. Johnny gives a weak thumbs up. The knocking sound continues. Johnny turns. A STEEL HAND taps the side of the tank. Johnny grins, astonished. The man wearing it is his former high school teacher, now a Lieutenant, Jean Rasczak. 121
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - AQZ - A BATTLE GROUP consisting of STARSHIPS, their tender, FREIGHTERS and other SUPPLY CRAFT. 122
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - M.I. QUARTERS - JOHNNY stows his gear along with Ace and Dizzy. Acroos the room, a collection of battle-hardened vets check out the newcomers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dizzy says you two knew this Rasczak character in Buenos Aires...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was our teacher... He was great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, I hear he's a real nutbuster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Roughnecks killed more bugs than any other outfit in 2nd Brigade... Only took 15% casualties on Big K. They size up the Roughnecks. There are scars, power prosthetics, and one, big SUGAR WATKINS, 26, wears a bug claw on a chain around his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seeing as how we're about all that's left of  1st Brigade, you'd have to call that an improvement. (to Sugar Watkins) You top kick ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding ? They always get killed. You want the job ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns, gives Johnny the once over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would. Nice earring. Dizzy looks her over. Not too big, but she's tough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where you been besides Big K ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outer rings. Zegema Beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I always wanted to go to Zegema Beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck. It's not there anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is your Lieutenant as bad as they say ? Birdie belts him, and Ace goes down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one talks about the Lieutenant that way. He saved my life ! Ace jumps up, ready to fight, but other Roughnecks block him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mine, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Same for me... me, too... Johnny and Dizzy shrug. Ace's on his own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like he is quite a guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps into the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Attention ! Everyone snaps to. Rasczak enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is for you new people. I only have two rules. Rule one, everyone fights. Rule two, no one quits. If you don't do your job, I'll kill you myself. Do you get me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We get you, sir ! He points at Johnny's earring with his steel hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get rid of the jewelry. I hate it. Welcome to the Roughnecks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rasczak's Roughnecks ! The Roughnecks cheer. Rasczak smiles vaguely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. There's a new Sky Marshall and a new plan. We're gonna clean out the systems outlying Klendathu one planet at a time. Tomorrow we hit Tango Urilla. After Fleet glasses the planet, M.I. mops up. 123
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - BUG WARRIORS stand sentry on earthworks that tower the entrance to their colony where an endless line of WORKERS enter bearing foodstuff appropriate to this exotic jungle planet. A distant sound. A warrior looks up, curious. Suddenly a FORMATION OF TAC FIGHTERS screams down from high orbit and a white hot nuclear firestorm burns consumes the landscape. Bugs scream as they twist and kick in the wall of flame. Heat melts the dirt into dark glass. Ash turns the sky red. The out of the smoke come Rasczak and his Roughnecks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spread out, teams of three. When you locate a bug hole, secure it, gas it, and close it. 124
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - FLATS - DAY - TAC FIGHTERS streak by overhead. On the ground, Johnny, Dizzy and Ace are on the bounce. Ace spots a bug hole where workers and warrors have broken through the glassed surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There. Rockets take out warriors. Bug guts go flying. Dizzy sets workers on fire. Johnnx and Ace step over burning bug carcasses to the rim of the hole and fire their gas rounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire in the hole ! Johnny drops an H.E. round, and they're in the air when the explosion collapses the entrance to the bug city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You new guys over there...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: could use some help... 125
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MOUNTAINS - BUGS boil out of the ground. Birdie, Sugar Watkins and other Roughnecks are about to be overrun when Johnny touches down wuth Ace and Dizzy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you've got a little bug problem, ma'am...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stow it, trooper. Give it verything you've got ! The cao troopers let the bugs have it, but the insects keep coming, the living crawling over the dead, and now, trudging up out of the ground, comes a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The tanker bug starts to spray, creating a toxic perimeter around the hole. Rasczak arrives just as Birdie takes a chemical hit, falling to ground minus an arm, screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Johnny jumps, landing behind the tanker bug in the mouth of the hole. It turns with surprising speed. Johnny flips up onto its back, cracks its armor with his pulse cannon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sugar, in for pick up ! Rasczak and Sugar Watkins pull Birdie to safety. Johnny fires a rocket into the hole he's made in the tanker bug's back, and jumps clear. KA-WHAP ! The big bug explodes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gas that hole and close it ! The Roughnecks fire gas rockets into the bug hole. Johnny touches down beside Rasczak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where'd you learn to do that, soldier ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uni High Tigers, sir. Don't you remember ? I was captain of the team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not interested in nostalgia, Rico, I need a corporal. You're it until you're dead or I find someone better. Rasczak turns away, gives Birdie prosthetic thumps up as she is carried past to meet an arriving skimmer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Birdie, your next arm comes with a factory guarantee ! Dizzy and Ace gather around Johnny, clap him on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Way to go, amigo !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna need a squad leader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way. Big K taught me I ain't executive material.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about it, Diz ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like I'm your girl, sir. Tac Fighters reel by over head. WOMP ! Suddenly, BUG PLASMA shoots skyward from the flatlands below. Several Tac Fighters are blown out of the air. Flaming debris rains down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saddle up, Roughnecks. That's our trash ! Roughnecks head out on the bounce. 126
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - RIDGE - DAY - JOHNNY and the others look down a sheer cliff on the bug battery, a charred circular pit some ten meters across. Inside, something is moving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of stinkin' bug is that ? Johnny jumps the magnification on his "head up". Down in the pit, a giant translucent PLASMA BUG rears out of one of the subterranean tunnels that ring the battery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You never seen how they do it before ? Johnny shakes his head. Swollen BREEDER BUGS gather around the plasma bug to inject it with their catalytic jelly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agghh ! It's making me sick...! The plasma bug writhes in pain and begins to swell, color changing from yellow to blue in accordance with some violent internal chemical reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gonna pop !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The plasma bug explodes in its cauldron. A blast of bug plasma streaks past them towards the heavens. Now a new plasma bug crawls into the pit to begin the cycle anew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, look ! Sergeant Gillespie points. A hole opens near the battery and dozens of warriors rampage out of the ground and up the cliff face toward the Roughneck position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must be right over the colony. Let's get some air support, eh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir ! Fleet, this is Roughneck patrol, over ...? Rasczak moves off down the line giving orders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Corporal, I want pulse cannons there and there ! Rifle teams, spread out along the ridge ! Sugar, bring up that flame thrower !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fleet's pulling the battle group back to safe distance... They'd like us to knock out those batteries, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'd rather spend our lives than risk their ships. Who's got the nuke ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'd be me, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heat it up. Dizzy activates a tactical nuke. It makes a distinctive HIGHPITCHED SQUEAL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roughnecks, you may fire at will. The Roughnecks open fire. Bugs are blown to pieces but they keep climbing. A warrior breeches their line. Sugar Watkins torches it. The nuke's ready light flashes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hot, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAST SHIELDS DOWN ! Johnny blows a warrior away from the edge. Dizzy leans over and fires. The rocket streaks down toward the battery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! An explosion in the two kiloton range turns the world black and white. When color returns Johnny and the others look down on the smoldering crater which was once the bug battery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now comes the part I hate the most.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We go down into the colony and make sure all the queens are dead. 127
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS fight their way down gassed-out tunnels into bug city. They meet warrors at every turn and kill them. Helmet lamps make weird shadows of dead bugs piled everywhere along the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew the Lieutenant before the war... What was he like ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was a teacher , kind of a know it all... Always had this little smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Geez, I don't think I've ever seen him smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must fill your bottle up real quick when your wife and kids get smeared. Johnny joins Rasczak, Ace and Dizzy and they blow away several warriors guarding the entrance of a large chamber. 128
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE QUEENS are eight meters long with corpulent bodies and tiny heads. Only one survives, and though she is herself dying, her abdomen, rippled by life within, continues to undulate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All dead except one, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill the bitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. Johnny signals. Dizzy's pulse cannon rips open the dying queen. Thousands of wriggling premature bugs come spilling out. Horrified, knee-deep Roughnecks set them afire. 129
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BASE CAMP - DAY - FLEET ENGINEERS unload PRE-FAB BARRACKS from HERCULES CARGO BOATS. Roughnecks eat. Rasczak stands, banging a spoon on his mess kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tango Urilla is now bug free. Means the Roughnecks have killed  a helluva lotta bugs...! Roughnecks cheer. Rasczak kicks open a CARGO MODULE. Beer kegs rool out. He kicks open a second module. Inside, musical instruments. Ace picks up a violin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expect the best, but I give the best. Habve some fun. That's an order ! 130
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - LATER - ACE leads a little quartet, plays a sweet fiddle. Roughnecks laugh and dance. Dizzy tries to pull Johnny into the fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, I don't do that anymore...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You used to dance...
direction.name: direction
