direction.raw_text: I said no. Want me to pull rank ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, excuse me, sir... Dizzy heads back to the others. Johnny turns and finds Rasczak regarding him with an odd, sad smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yopu asked me some advice once, Rico. Want some now ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never pass up a good thing, eh ? Gillespie appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant, Brigade's on the com... Rasczak heads away. Johnny joins Dizzy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Diz...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ? Johnny takes her hand, bows implishly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I have the honor ? He pulls her out among the others and they begin to dance. Ace watches with a grin, puts some spirit in his fiddle. 131
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - NIGHT - RASCZAK is in holo conference with an INTELLIGENCE OFFICER INTELLIGENCE OFFICER At 0821 we received a distress call from Planet P, priority code, requesting reinforcement...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought 4th brigade cleaned out P. INTELLIGENCE OFFICER Owen reported the eradication of a low generation colony a month ago. That's why MICOM wants onsite assessment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds more like some idiot at Military Intelligence Command wants to get me and my cap troopers killed... The Intelligence Officer reddens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take your group down to P and have a look see. Leave the thinking to us, Lieutenant. That's not your job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My job is to protect the lives of my soldiers so they can kill bugs, Major, and if you're walking me into a trap-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bugs don't lay traps... They aren't intelligent ! Unlike you, they're stupid enough to follow orders !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll be all, Major. Dismissed. The Intelligence Officer disappears abruptly. A new hologram appears. Rasczak's jaw drops. It's his former student Carl Jenkins, now a Colonel, weary and pissed off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This conference is over. Do your duty, Lieutenant. That's an order. Rasczak recovers, salutes stiffly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. 132
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY AND DIZZY are making love. The door pops open. Rasczak stands there. Dizzy ducks under the covers. Johnny manages a salute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Corporal, the Roughnecks are moving out for Planet P immediately. Get yourself squared away and report to Gillespie for logistics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's that with you ? Dizzy shows herself, grinning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Report in ten minutes. Rasczak slams the door shut on them. They fall back into one anothers arms, laughing as they resume lovemaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Planet P ? What kind of name is that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They ran out of names a long time ago in this part of the galaxy. 133
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BAD LANDS - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS move through canyons of towering wind-carved rock formations. Gillespie carries the communications package.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand it, Lieutenant. It's not getting anything from 4th Brigade... not even their transponder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep trying, Sergeant. 134
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CONTINUING - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS walk in a column far below. Something is watching from the above... HOPPERS, lots of them, moving from rock to rock for better position. 135
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CONTINUING - DAY - ACE sees something out of the corner of his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! The hoppers hit. Several Roughnecks go down. Everyone opens up. Dive-bombing bugs are blown to bits. Roughnecks set them on fire when they hit the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny, watch out ! A burning bug hurls itself at Johnny. Johnny jumps out of the way as Dizzy fires, blowing it apart. The deadly hoppers seem to be everywhere above them in the rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! ON THE BOUNCE ! 136
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS move out into the open. In the distance they see 4th Brigade HQ, a walled compound and partially constructed landing pad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gillespie, put in call for retrieval. We're off this rock. Gillespie, do you read me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Two hoppers are pulling Gillespie up into the rocks where other bugs join to feast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Throw a rifle ! Dizzy tosses her Morita to Rasczak. Gillespie writhes in the hopper's claws. Rasczak fires, killing Gillespie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expext any one here to do the same for me... Rico, Watkins, Flores, Levy prepare for rear guard action. The rest of you make for 4th Brigade. Johnny and the others cover the Roughneck retreat as hoppers soar down on the flat lands from the canyon walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! Johnny and the others blast bugs out of the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! A second wave of hoppers come in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! For now, the sky is clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! ON THE BOUNCE ! 137
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE OUTPOST is 50 meters by 100, standard issue pre-fab. The Roughnecks land on the compound wall. Inside, WORKER BUGS graze on the remains of 200 dead cap troopers strewn over the complex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jeez, Command really humped the bunk on this one... Rasczak turns away. Roughnecks engage in the sport of methodically killing the workers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rico, you're acting Sergeant now. My last Sergeant lost the com pack. Put together a search team and find the radio shack. We need retrieval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. 138
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - OFFICE COMPLEX - DAY - JOHNNY surveys the aftermath of the last stand with Rasczak, insect and human dead everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's here, sir. 139
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - RASCZAK AND JOHNNY enter the radio room. A DEAD MAJOR is slumped over the console with hole in the back of his head. Johnny checks the equipment. It' dead, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Diz, see what you can do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on it ! Dizzy goes to work. Rasczak checks the wound in the back of the dead major's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that look like to you, Rico ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like a bug was in his brain, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant, I think you're gonna wanna see this, sir. 140
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - A BUG HOLE in the middle of the floor is surrounded by carnage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dirty bugs came in right when they were having chow !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gas that hole and seal it. Then they hear a sound. Tap tap tap. Rasczak signals for quiet. Tap tap tap tap. It's coming from the kitchen. 141
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS enter cautiously. The noise is coming from a freezer. Ace stands ready to fire. Johnny levers open the door, jumps back as GENERAL OWEN, 60, tumbles out face first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer on the deck, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pick up the general ! Roughnecks prop him up. General Owen tries to talk, but no words come out. Rasczak bends down to listen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out... you gotta get me out...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General Owen, sir ? The old man grins, hugely relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At ease, Lieutenant. Thank God for you, for all of you...this is grand... so where's the boat ? 142
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - HALLWAY - DAY - JOHNNY AND RASCZAK help the old General, now wrapped in a blanket, rambling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was forced to hide, of course. The security of the Federation in this theater of operations was at stake !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Diz, what's with the uplink ? Dizzy lokks up from where she is working on the radio controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Workin on it...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They get in your mind... they make you do things ! Look here... They did it to Farley...! He points at the hole of the dead major's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The distress call... The bugs wanted us to rescue you...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you can be sure of it ! They were biding their time... waiting for the most opportune moment ! Rasczak's lost interest in the general. He's on the com.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To all Roughnecks, this is Rasczak. Prepare for attack. Repeat. We are going to be attacked...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They weren't gonna do it to me. Oh no ! I know too many secrets ! Rasczak looks at General Owen with contempt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire in the hole ! An explosion in the mess hall closes the bug hole. 143
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - GENERAL OWEN blinks as he steps out into the light. Roughnecks snap to attention. General Owen looks at the carnage that was once his command and begins to keen, collapsing to his knees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh God...! My soldiers...! All of my boys and girls...! The Roughnecks are shocked. They've never seen a general break down before. Lieutenant Rasczak slaps Owen hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up ! Your soldier's dead and you're not !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know... I wish you'd shoot me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I oughta ! And it looks like Rasczak just might, but just then Ace touches down next to Johnny and Rasczak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant, we got trouble ! 144
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - RASCZAK and Johnny join other stunned Roughnecks to see THOUSANDS OF BUGS on the march from every direction. Bug batteries open up in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warm it all up ! Everything you got ! Levy, collect the big guns from the towers. Watkins, put General Owen with the wounded. Rico, where's my communications ?

direction.raw_text: What's going on, Diz ?

direction.raw_text: I got power ! Gimme a minute ! Johnny runs for the communications room.

direction.raw_text: We don't have a minute ! 145

direction.raw_text: Johnny races out the door. 146

dialogue.raw_text: Roughneck patrol to battle group... Roughneck patrol to battle group...

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) This is Rodger Young... What's going on down there ? We're taking plasma ! We have Orion P-11 as clear !

dialogue.raw_text: Landing zone is extremely hostile. Come down on this transmission !
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then I hope you have a crazy pilot ! Keep the line open, Dizzy !

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE COMPOUND is white hot as Roughnecks on the walls unload nukes. Johnny crosses the compound, lands next to Rasczak on the wall.

direction.raw_text: Jeez, we musta killed a million already...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not enough, I guess. Sugar Watkins sees Genera Owen in the compound below, stumbling aimlessly among his dead soldiers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General ! GENERAL, stay with the wounded... Sir, the general...!

direction.raw_text: Ah, the hell with him... Hoppers sweep into the compound. The Roughnecks open fire. General Owen make easy pickings for ones that get through.

direction.raw_text: Fall back... form a circle ! If no living bug comes over that wall, we cannot be harmed. Dizzy arrives on thr bounce as the Roughnecks fall back into the compound. Bugs pile in over the walls. The circle affords them 360 degrees of kill zone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rico, Flores, Watkins, Levy ! We control the sky until retrieval !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir ! Rasczak, Sugar Watkins, Johnny and Dizzy stand back-to-back in the center of the circle, sweeping the skies with the heavy guns from the towers. Hoppers are blown to pieces.

direction.raw_text: Getting low here, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rounds and counting, sir !

direction.raw_text: Sergeant, secure the boat !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir ! Roughnecks move to protect the boat. The hatch blows open.

direction.raw_text: Board the wounded ! Dead bugs ring the compound walls, forming ramps for living insect soldiers to enter the compound in greater numbers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move to retrieval on my command ! First group, now...! The circle shrinks as Roughnecks fall back and board the boat. More and more bugs pile in over the compound walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, Flores ! Levy ! Rico...! Suddenly, the ground collapses under Rasczak. He falls in to his waist, vomits blood as something chews on him from below.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hit your jets, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't My legs are gone... Get on the boat... The compund wall collapses. A wave of bugs charges in.

direction.raw_text: Rico, tell'em to glass this goddam planet. I've never seen so many bugs upstairs at the same time...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not leaving you here, sir ! Weakly, Rasczak picks up his pulse gun, checks the power.

direction.raw_text: This is my farm. Get on the boat,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! That's an order, Sergeant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give'em hell, sir ! Johnny and Dizzy run for the boat. Rasczak opens fire, picking his shots, but soon the bugs are all over him.

direction.raw_text: C'mon you sons of bitches ! There's no bug alive can kill a real mAAAAAAA ! At the boat, Dizzy turns to look back at Rasczak. A hopper swoops down on Dizzy, it's claws ripping into her abdomen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! GET IT OFF ME GET IT OFF GET IT OFF GET IT AAAAAAAAAA ! Johnny blows the bug off her back. Blood sprays from a deep gash in her neck. Johnny picks her up, tries to stop the blood with his hand. The life is leaving her eyes.

direction.raw_text: Hang on, Diz... don't die on me...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: GET IT OFF ME GET IT OFF GET IT OFF GET IT AAAAAAAAAA

direction.raw_text: breaches the broken wall. Ace jumps out to help his friends. The hatch closes just as the tanker bug sprays. The boat blasts off, dripping metal. 147

direction.raw_text: I bought the farm, didn't I, Johnny ?

direction.raw_text: No, you're gonna be alright, Diz !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright 'cause I got to have you, Johnny...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: push Johnny aside, go to work on Dizzy. 148

direction.raw_text: Get on the com and tell Fleet to glass that rock...! The co-pilot turns around. It's Zander. His eyes narrow.

direction.raw_text: This would be mine, sir. Acting Sergeant John Rico. I've assumed command on this mission. The pilot turns around. It's Carmen.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! Dizzy dies. A Medic slaps her. Her head lolls, mouth open, eyes blank. They drop her and move on to the next casualty. Johnny sits there, stunned. Carmen enters from the cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Negative on your request. Fleet Command has the battle group on standby... Carmen sees Dizzy lying dead on the deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I'm sorry.

direction.raw_text: We gotta choke on the mud and the blood and Fleet can't be bothered to spit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I think something's up. The Sky Marshall's here. She points out for a viewing port. Johnny looks. Fifteen battle groups, 100 ships strong, lay off Planet P, all of them dwarfed by the Sky Marshall's flagship, Buenos Aires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were KIA, Johnny...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was just a mix up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look so... I don't know, you look like you've really been in it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to your eye ? Carmen touches the scar over her eye.

direction.raw_text: Almost got knocked out of the sky over Big K.

direction.raw_text: I like it. It's kinda...you. 150
direction.name: direction

result.heading: DIZZY JOHNNY HEH HEH CAN'T HEH BREATHE GOD JOHNNY CAN'T HEH HEH HEH HEH

direction.raw_text: - ORION SYSTEM - THE BOAT lands on the flight deck of the Rodger Young in the midst of the flotilla. 151

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A funeral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That girl who died on the way up ...his girl ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you feel about him now ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, Zander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - GUNNERY DECK - CARMEN enters as Johnny speaks. Dizzy is laid out in dress gray. The surviving Roughnecks have gathered to pay final respects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dizzy bought the farm. She was my good friend, and friens are the best luck anyone gets... But in war, we must go on without our friends. We take with us their memory, and we are left to wonder if there is meaning in their death. Let me tell you what it is: Dizzy bough the farm so we can keep on fighting. Several INTELLIGENCE OFFICERS march into the bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer on deck ! Everyone snaps to attention. Colonel Carl Jenkins strides into the room. His eyes are hollow, and he looks grim. He returns Johnny's salute, nods to Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please continue, Sergeant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dizzy wouldn't want our tears. She'd want us to remember her... with a vengeance. So go out and kill a bug for Dizzy. Kill as many as you can. You are her revenge, and every bug you kill honors her death. Johnny nods to the GUNNERY CREW. They load Dizzy's body into a tube. Johnny steps back, salutes Dizzy. Everyone salutes.

direction.raw_text: Womb to tomb, cap trooper !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Womb to tomb ! The CREW CHIEF fires the tube. Out the viewports, A PULSE OF LIGHT disperses into space. The Roughnecks file out. Carl approaches. Carmen takes Johnny and Carl by the hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, look at this. The three of us back together again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you, Carl ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny, I'm sorry it had to be your unit on Planet P. That mission had a very low survival probability...

direction.raw_text: Bugs laid a trap, didn't they ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elegant proof of intelligence, isn't it ? We thought there might be a brain on P.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew and you sent them anyway ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A colony has to reach a certain size before it produces a Brain... we think
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: generations. Woulda too expensive to launch an operation if there wasn't a Brain... Carl sees the way Carmen is looking at him, like he's a bug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't approve. Well, too bad. We're in this for the species, boys and girls. It's simple numbers, they have more, and everyday I have to make decisions that send hundreds of people like you to their deaths.

direction.raw_text: Didn't they tell you, Colonel ? That's what cap troopres are good for. Carl allows himself a tiny smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hope you're ready for more. We're going back to P to capture that Brain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Roughnecks are always ready, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear they need a new Lieutenant... Want the job ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take it... until I get killed or you find someone better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sound. Suddenly, everyone has someplace to go.

direction.raw_text: Hope you get your Brain Bug, Carl.

direction.raw_text: It's good to see you two. It reminds me of the way things were before... Carl turns abruptly and heads away. His entourage follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care, wilya Johnny ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you on the bounce ! 153

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He requested a combat assignment. There's always a need for experienced pilots on the ground. I had no choice but to let him go... He said you'd understand. Carmen bites her lip, takes first chair. Deladier feels bad for her, knows she's made a painful decision. 154
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer on the deck ! Roughnecks fall in. Johnny steps into the room. There are many new and much younger faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I only have two rules. Rule one, everyone fights. Rule two, no one quits. If you don't do your job, I'll kill you myself. Do you get me ?

direction.raw_text: We get you, sir !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who're all these kids ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got reinforced. Most of'em just got outa boot...

direction.raw_text: We're the old men, Ace. 155

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll take this high ground. Lookouts there and therte and up there. If the bugs come upstairs in this neighbor-hood, we'll be the first to know.

direction.raw_text: Alright, cut it out. We will deploy from skimmers in teams of six. If the bugs open up a battery, we put it out of business. Any questions ?

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better talk to the boss. The cargo bays open to deploy FLEET SKIMMERS. Zander jumps down to oversee the operation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're standing on my H.Q., Lieutenant !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a Fleet-driven operation, son, and the Fleet thinks my boat will be safer on the high ground. You can have everything else, eh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You heard the Sky Marshall... Move it all down - Suddenly, in the distance, bug batteries open fire, not one but twenty. Zander and Johnny share a look of concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rodger Young, prepare to receice outgoing fire...! (to his crew chief) I'll take the first group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saddle up, boys, that's our trash ! 156

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Evasive action ! Carmen dodges other starships, turns to her new number 2.

direction.raw_text: Prepare for warp !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, ma'am ! Warp in 5... 4...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Rodger Young takes a direct hit. 158

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BRIDGE - CAPTAIN DELADIER calmy evacuates the bridge. Power fails and so does the gravity.

direction.raw_text: This is Rodger Young, we're going down... Repeat, this is Rodger Young, we're going down...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ibanez...LET'S GO ! 160

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Carmen hits the release, pulls her free. Deladier pushes Carmen away.

direction.raw_text: Leave me, Lieutenant ! That's an order !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way, ma'am ! 161

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PLANET P ORBIT - THE RODGER YOUNG disintegrates as lifepods shoot away toward the planet. 163

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your problem now, Lieutenant ?

direction.raw_text: The Rodger Young just burned up... Johnny's face falls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any survivors ? Zander points. Far in the distance, a glowing pod plummets toward the planet. Johnny tracks it on his "head up". 165
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ATMOSPHERE - DAY - CARMEN is shaken violently as the pod hits atmosphere. 166
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - CARMEN'S POD hits and goes straight through the crust of Planet P. 167
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE POD comes to rest. Carmen blows the hatch, pulls Deladier out, grabs a Morita pulse rifle. Tunnels lead in every direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Lieutenant Carmen Ibanez. Is anyone receiving ? 168
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY grabs the handset from Ace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Affirmative ! Carmen, this is Roughneck base camp... What is your present location ? 169
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - CARMEN sees a warrior coming at her from out of the shadows. Carmen fires a burst and kills it. Now there are two. Carmen backs up firing, but there are too many.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My present location is 42 degrees South by 176 degrees East... situation is extremely hostile... I...AAAAAAAAA ! They have her. She puts the barrel of the Morita in her mouth, but a claw cut her trigger finger off at the knuckle. 170
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ROUGHNECK BASE CAMP - DAY - JOHNNY and Zander are horrified by what they hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've gotta go get her !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know as well as I do she's probably already dead. Johnny knows it's true, swallows bitterly, turns away. That's when he sees it. Nearby, the ground shifts, a claw breaks through, a hole opens up and bugs boil up out of the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here they come ! They turn and see a second bug hole open up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're outa here. Lieutenant, get your men into the skimmers. This real estate's about to go buggy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, just calm down, I'm giving the orders here- The entire area underneath the base camp collapses to form a huge new canyon. The Hercules boat topples, crushing Skimmers and unfortunate Fleet personnnel. 171
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY and the surviving Roughnecks pick themselves up. The are now 30 meters below the planet's surface. Above them, bugs line the wide rim of the newly formed canyon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Form a perimeter ! Through the dust, exposed bug tunnels can be seen in the canyon walls and piling out of them by the score, deadly Arachnid warriors. Johnny throws Zander a pulse cannon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make yourself useful, fly boy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Roughnecks open fire at the charging bug horde. Warriors are blown to pieces. Gas grenades fly and H.E. rounds close tunnels. A maimed warrior gets through and heads for Zander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Johnny and Ace team up to blow it away. Zander takes a deep breath, loos around, impressed. The Roughnecks have killed a great many bugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace, get on the com. Tell Fleet we need retrieval... Sugar, salvage some armor and suit up Lieutenant Barcalow. Sugar Watkins tosses a bloody jump boot his way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fleet Command says retrieval's no go. The battle group's at safe distance... and we got another problem. Ace points out a Tanker bug that's been brough up to the rim. Johnny sees another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like they're gonna hose us down... Johnny chews on this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright... Listen up, Roughnecks. We're gonna head west down through bug city, pick up any Rodger Young survivors we run across, and join A Company. Get me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We get you, sir ! Zander, awkward in a power suit, confronts Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think you're doing ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna save Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That would mean a comlete disregard for the mission objective. They hang you for that, Rico.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that's right. Johnny and Zander stare each other down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move out. Johnny starts for the gaping mouth of an exposed bug tunnel and the others fall in behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bug hunt !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY leads his deadly force through enemy territory. The Roughnecks kill everything that gets in their way. Zander lends his inexperienced hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Barcalow, save power, don't waste it on workers... Ace, tell Aardvark we're on our way...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir ! Warriors appear in the tunnel behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sugar, close the tunnel...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire in the hole ! Sugar Watkins fires an H.E. round and seals the tunnel. 173
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - FEEDING PIT - DAY - CARMEN opens her eyes. She can hear BUGS CLICKING. She's in a pit filled with human dead. A nearby carcass wears a uniform from 4th Brigade Off in the dark she hears HUMAN MOANING. She crawls over rotting corpses toward the sound. The moaning turns to SCREAMING. It's coming from outside the pit. She pulls herself up to peer over the edge. 174        INT        BUG CITY - THE ROYAL COURT - DAY - CARMEN sees hundred of bugs at work, WARRIORS, WORKERS and dozens of small (2 meters) CHARIOT BUGS. Aworker walks pas, stepping on her, but pays her no attention. She sees the source of the screaming:        Captain Deladier is hold between two warriors, and she's screaming because of what she sees,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...! OH PLEASE... The BRAIN BUG is huge (5 meters) and pulpy. I has vestigial legs that cannot support ist weight, and so it must be moved by a shifting carpet of chariot bugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...OH GOD AAAAAAAAAAAAA...! A thorn-like PALP unfolds out of the brain bug and strikes, driving deep into Deladier's head and sucks her brains out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Carmen watches horrified as Deladier dies. The suddenly a warrior grabs her from above and drags her out of the pit. She screams as its claws slice into her limbs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Now the brain bug comes for her. She sees the palp unfold, the thorn-like spike coming toward her. Carmen is no longer looking for escape. All she wants to do is die. Suddenly, every bug in the chamber stops as though to listen. Carmen hears it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: getting louder. Johnny enters the chamber alone. The warriors move toward him. He holds up a NUKE, source of the high-pitched tone. The ready light flashes. The Brain Bug emits a series of harsh clicks. The warriors freeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what this is...? Johnny makes an explosive sound. The Brain Bug slowly withdraws its palp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure you do... You're a big fat smart bug, aren't you ? Johnny moves toward Carmen. The Brain Bug's multiple eyes track him. The warriors holding Carmen threaten. Johnny turns on the brain bug, his finger on the nuke's trigger. JOHNNY I'll take you with me. The Brain Bug clicks. The warriors back off. Carmen collapses. Johnny reaches for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take my hand ! Chariot bugs move the Brain Bug down a hole. Workers seal the hole behind it with amazing speed. Johnny drags Carmen back toward the tunnel he entered from. The warriors charge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roughnecks...NOW ! Johnny throws himself on top of Carmen as the Roughnecks burst into the chamber, guns blazing. The fight is furious, point blank, deadly to bug and Roughneck alike. Sugar Watkins screams as a warrior rips his arm off. Zander takes a claw through the gut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He blows it away, sees his intestines hanging out of the wound, shoves them back inside and keeps on fighting. A warrior rears up over Johnny and Carmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weapon ! Ace throws him a Morita. Johnny catches it, pumps three rounds into the bug's nerve stem. He struggles out from under the dead warrior. Every bug in the chamber is dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you hurt ? Carmen throws her arms around Johnny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johnny...! Zander takes this in. Carmen sees him, then his wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zander...! Oh, you're hurt. Ace takes a look at his wound, makes a face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah geez... Zander pushes him away, struggles to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you walk ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get some armor on her, and the we'll get outa this stinkin bug hole ! Various components are gladly passed forward. Johnny and Ace help her putting it on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought I was dead. Lucky for me you jokers showed up, eh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't luck. Rico ignored the mission objective to rescue you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it true ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, if I live through this, they'll probably hang me. Now com'on, let's move out ! 175
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS double-time it, racing for the surface. They come to a fork.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which way ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up. We gotta be near A Company by now. The tunnel floor drops out. FIVE ROUGHNECKS disappear into the hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: climb up into the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Roughnecks bachk up fast, shooting. Zander staggers, collapses. Johnny drops to his side, rolls him over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How bad are you, pal ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Been better, buddy. Johnny sees warriors coming up into the tunnel by the score.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, we're gonna carry you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, I figureyou folks oughta get upstairs before it's too late... Gimmee the nuke. Zander checks his pulse cannon's available power.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be a hero...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my farm. Now c'mon, give me what you got and get out of here... Johnny nods, hands him the nuke. Carmen sees what's happening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zander, what are you doing ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just giving you something to remember me by, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zander, no...! He grabs her and kisses her. Johnny drags Carmen away. Zander opens fire as the first warriors reach his position. 176
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INCLINED TUNNEL - DAY - JOHNNY AND CARMEN race desperately for the surface. They hear the chatter of Zander's pulse cannon and the screams of dying bugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .GO GO GO GO...! Tears stream down from Carmen's face. 177
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY - JOHNNY AND CARMEN and the surviving Roughnecks make it to the surface.
direction.name: direction
